main event: Aircrews of C-47 aircraft observed an unidentified object of 15-16 feet changing colors from white to blue to red to green over Grand Island and North Platte, Nebraska.
interesting points: The object was observed at an altitude of 8,000 feet and lasted for approximately 8 minutes,The object changed colors during the observation,The sighting involved personnel from both ground and air,The object was reported to have a ground speed of approximately 700 knots,No final conclusion about the object's nature could be reached from the observation.
location: Grand Island & North Platte, Nebraska, USA
witness description: Lt. Col. Edward J. Ruppelt, 1st Lt. Charles M. Baker, Cpl. William Stampe, Cpl. Allen Parker
